scripts.migrate:create: node -r ts-node/register -r ./src/shared/env-loader node_modules/.bin/node-pg-migrate create -m src/shared/infra/migrations --migration-file-language sql
scripts.seed:dev: node -r ts-node/register -r ./src/shared/env-loader -e "require('pg').Pool({host:process.env.DB_HOST,port:process.env.DB_PORT,user:process.env.DB_USER,password:process.env.DB_PASSWORD,database:process.env.DB_NAME}).query(require('fs').readFileSync('src/shared/infra/seeds/dev-seed.sql','utf8')).then(()=>console.log('✅ Dev seed data loaded successfully')).catch(e=>{console.error('❌ Error loading seed data:',e.message);process.exit(1)})"
scripts.db:reset:dev: npm run migrate:down && npm run migrate && npm run seed:dev
scripts.dev:stack: npm run docker:dev:up && docker-compose -f ../../docker/docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f api
scripts.test:stack: npm run docker:test:up && docker-compose -f ../../docker/docker-compose.test.yml logs -f api
